column4: Why does the kernel set some of my USB ports to uhci rather than ehci? Is it safe for me just to blacklist uhci_hcd?
uhci is for some usb 1.1 host chip devices (the others use ohci) ehci is for all USB 2.0 host chip devices
right, but i should have all 2.0 controllers on my mobo (or that's what the mobo documentation says)
many chips support 1.1 and 2.0 on the same chip so they use both (o|u)hci and ehci
